amendment.description: To modify certain requirements related to counterdrug activities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4424 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4424 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Biden. (consideration: CR S6377-6392; text: CR S6384) To modify certain requirements related to counterdrug activities.
